short_summary: Janitorial services required for Melfort Research Farm
description: Supply and delivery of janitorial services for Melfort Research Farm located in Melfort, SK
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Janitorial Services

## Title: 
Janitorial Services for Melfort SK, Research Farm

## Reference Number:
cb-342-22234499

## Tender Number:
01R11-24-C016

## Closing Date:
January 4, 2024, 12:00 PM (local time)

## Description:
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a contractor to provide Janitorial services at its Melfort Research Farm located at 6 Highway 6 South, Melfort, SK.

## Evaluation Criteria:
The bid will be evaluated on the basis of technical and financial aspects, with a focus on meeting all mandatory technical requirements.

## Security Requirements:
Security clearances will be required for personnel requiring access to the research farm. All personnel must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS granted or approved by AAFC.

## Tender Details:

* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and others (refer to original document for complete list)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Melfort, SK; Saskatchewan
* **Contracting Entity:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Desta Kissack, Senior Contracting Officer
	+ Phone: 204-583-8127
	+ Email: desta.kissack@agr.gc.ca

## Mandatory Site Visit:
A site visit is mandatory and will be held on December 7, 2023, at 10:00 am local time (CST). Bidders are requested to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

## Submission Instructions:
Bids must be submitted electronically through the Canada Post Corporation's CPC Connect service by the closing date and time indicated above.

## Government Procurement:
Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Integrity Regime:
The Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada applies to AAC's procurement activities. Bidders must comply with the integrity provisions outlined in the solicitation.

## Further Information:
Refer to the attached solicitation documents for additional information. The Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/s
